text: Les Aventures de Till L'Espiègle is a French-East German film, based on The Legend of Thyl Ulenspiegel and Lamme Goedzak. It was released in 1956. ==Cast== * Gérard Philipe: Till Eulenspiegel * Jean Vilar: The Duke of Alva * Fernand Ledoux: Claes * Nicole Berger: Nele * Jean Carmet: Lamme Goedzak * Jean Debucourt: The cardinal. * Erwin Geschonneck: Bras d'Acier * Wilhelm Koch-Hooge: William the Silent * Elfriede Florin: Soetkin ==References== ==External links== * Category:1956 films Category:1956 adventure films Category:French adventure films Category:French films Category:East German films Category:French-language films Category:Films set in the 16th century Category:Films set in Flanders Category:Films based on Belgian novels Category:Cultural depictions of William the Silent Category:Cultural depictions of Fernando Álvarez de Toledo, 3rd Duke of Alba Category:Till Eulenspiegel Category:Works about the Eighty Years' War Category:German adventure films
title: Les Aventures de Till L'Espiègle
